label: Classification
comment: A systematic arrangement of products in classes or categories according to established criteria.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the class for this product classification.
The textual description for the class content type of this product classification.
The code specifying the description of the class content type of this product classification.
A class name, expressed as text, for this product classification.
The code specifying the sub class for this product classification.
The unique identifier of the classification system for this product classification.
A name, expressed as text, of the classification system for this product classification.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.

referencedBy.comment: A product classification designated for this trade product.
